html:
the LORD. Hebrew. Jehovah. App-4.

the LORD That created thee. This is another Jehovah title (compare App-4.) = Jehovah Boraaka = Jehovah thy Creator.

Jacob . . . Israel. See notes onGenesis 32:28; Genesis 43:6; Genesis 45:26, Genesis 45:28 . SeeIsaiah 42:24 , above.

He That formed thee = thy Former.

Fear not. CompareIsaiah 43:5 .

redeemed. Hebrew. ga"al. See note onExodus 6:6 .
